meaning_str.bing:
n. 羞愧；羞耻；耻辱；惭愧
v. 使羞愧（或惭愧）；使蒙受耻辱；使丢脸
int. （表示同情或喜爱）真可惜
网络. 遗憾的事；羞辱

使羞愧（或惭愧）；使蒙受耻辱；使丢脸

羞愧；耻辱；羞耻；耻辱的来源；可耻的事物；带来耻辱的人；失望之事；令人惋惜的事；让人遗憾的事
使感到羞耻；使惭愧；使蒙受耻辱；羞辱；使丢脸；使蒙羞；使相形见绌
多么遗憾；太遗憾了；（表示同情或喜爱）真可惜；哎呀；真丢人；真讨厌

1.en: Trees do not bark, no doubt kill; people have no sense of shame, invincible.
1.cn: 树不要皮，必死无疑；人不要脸，天下无敌。

2.en: Maybe you could say she was an aggressive girl. Actually she was only a bragger who did not know what is the shame.
2.cn: 也许你觉得她是个很有杀伤力的女生，其实她只是个不知羞耻的吹牛者。

3.en: My tongue will tell of your righteous acts all day long, for those who wanted to harm me have been put to shame and confusion.
3.cn: 并且我的舌头，必终日讲论你的公义，因为那些谋害我的人，已经蒙羞受辱了。

0.en: It's okay, Doss. There's no shame in this.

1.en: You have lived in the shadows in shame and fear for too long. Come out.
1.cn: 你们在黑暗和羞愧中已经生活得够长时间了。

2.en: Oh, dear. I cannot tease you about that. What a shame, for I dearly love to laugh.
2.cn: 噢，亲爱的，我不能讥笑你了。对于我非常喜欢讥笑你，我深表羞愧。

3.en: Fine, you know what, that's it. From now on, Joey, I want you to be my best man. Yes. Shame about you man.
3.cn: 好，够了乔伊，从现在起你当我的伴郞。太好了！不过真的替你羞愧。

4.en: It's a shame. It was a beauty.

5.en: Oh, what a shame. I really liked her.

6.en: Shame on you! That's no dream for a scientist!
6.cn: 太可耻了！这不是科学家该有的梦！

7.en: That's a real shame, it really does smell fantastic.

8.en: Oh, like "shame" doesn't cover 1,000 different things?
8.cn: 说得好像“耻辱”不能指别的东西一样。

9.en: I was not flirting. And on your anniversary, for shame.
9.cn: 我没在打情骂俏。还在纪念日当天，丢脸！

10.en: That's why I've always despised you. You shame us all. You shame the family name.
10.cn: 所以我总是看不起你。你让我们所有人丢脸、你让家族蒙羞、

11.en: No. No way. No. And stop using my name. And shame on you. And shame on all of you. You're disgusting. Especially you with that.
11.cn: 不要！想都别想而且别再冒用我的名字，你真丢脸，你们都很丢脸，你们恶心死了，尤其是你，和你的那个。

12.en: Shame. 'Cause I have a real zinger about my tilted uterus.
12.cn: 真可惜，因为我有个很精彩的故事是关于我倾斜的子宫的。

13.en: Isn't it a shame when one girl ruins it for the whole bunch?
13.cn: 真是糟糕，一个女孩就毁了大家。

14.en: It's a shame people can't visit there. That is the rule though.
14.cn: 不过不能去看望实在是太不爽了，没办法，规矩就是这样。

15.en: Yeah. It's a shame you two didn't get to spend more time together.
15.cn: 没错，你们俩没多相处相处太可惜了

16.en: Or totally naked. I love Howard, but the dude needs a little shame.
16.cn: 或者是全裸，我爱霍华德，可这混小子真是毫无节操啊。

17.en: Shut it down? Well, that would be a shame, especially after yesterday.
17.cn: 关停吗？那太可惜了，特别是在昨天之后。

18.en: It's a shame you're joking. That'd be a lovely reading at our ceremony.
18.cn: 太遗憾你只是在挖苦了。不然本来很适合在我们婚礼朗诵呢。

19.en: Makes no difference now. I will bear the shame of this genocide forever.
19.cn: 这些都不重要了。我会永远因这次种族灭绝蒙羞。
